channel.title: Clean simple client
channel.description:
I don't know if this is the right section, so sorry if its not. I am looking for a clean simple client.. all the ones I find have interfaces and yadda yadda.. i just want to make a clean webclient that my clan mates can connect to my server and play. So far I have been failing at getting any webclients to work correctly. I enjoy the RSCemulation kind but that you have to download to play, which is fine in that context.
Anyone have suggestions of a client? I am running.. i think a 508 ExRendum private server source.
